Item.name: ScriptCode
Item.value: // default style var strokeColor = color.red; var opacity = 0.7; this.syncAnnotScan(); var annots = this.getAnnots(this.pageNum, ANSB_ModDate, true, // bReverse ANFB_ShouldAppearInPanel); if (annots != null) { for (var i = annots.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) { if (annots[i].type == "Highlight") { // go to next one if the current one is already in the right color if (!color.equal(annots[i].strokeColor, strokeColor)) { annots[i].opacity = opacity; annots[i].strokeColor = strokeColor; break; } } } }
